aqi.goodDesc: Air quality is satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk.
aqi.moderateDesc: Air quality is acceptable. However, there may be a risk for some people, particularly those who are unusually sensitive to air pollution.
aqi.unhealthySensitiveDesc: Members of sensitive groups may experience health effects. The general public is less likely to be affected.
aqi.unhealthyDesc: Some members of the general public may experience health effects; members of sensitive groups may experience more serious health effects.
aqi.veryUnhealthyDesc: Health alert: The risk of health effects is increased for everyone.
aqi.hazardousDesc: Health warning of emergency conditions: everyone is more likely to be affected.
